key.name: Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

It would be great if you could make a dent in the population of monsters and hostile forces tormenting the people of Maple World. Any enemy should do, outside of those in dungeons. But one person pitching in won't be enough. I'd like to issue this assignment to your whole guild. Please take <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> with you on this mission. Well, good luck!

It would be great if you could make a dent in the population of monsters and hostile forces tormenting the people of Maple World. Any enemy should do, outside of those in dungeons. But one person pitching in won't be enough. I'd like to issue this assignment to your whole guild. Please take <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> with you on this mission. Well, good luck!
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

I want you to defeat the mechanical monsters that have been tormenting scientists around the globe. But one person pitching in won't be enough. I'd like to issue this assignment to your whole guild. Please take <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> with you on this mission. Well, good luck!

I want you to defeat the mechanical monsters that have been tormenting scientists around the globe. But one person pitching in won't be enough. I'd like to issue this assignment to your whole guild. Please take <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> with you on this mission. Well, good luck!
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

Insects can be helpful or harmful to the environment. Unfortunately, the latter type has experienced a huge population boom. I'd like you and your guild to help us defeat insect enemies. Please take <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> with you on this mission. Thanks, and good luck!
I'd like you and your guild to help us defeat insect enemies. Please take <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> with you on this mission. Thanks, and good luck!
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

Inanimate monsters disguise themselves everyday objects to ambush unsuspecting people. I'd like you to reduce their numbers so that Maple World's denizens can breathe easy. Please take <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> with you on a hunt for inanimate monsters. Thanks, and good luck!
Please take <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> with you on a hunt for inanimate monsters. Thanks, and good luck!
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

If you can believe it, there have been reports of plants attacking people throughout the world... I'd like you to gather a group of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and deal with this green menace. Thanks, and good luck!
Gather a group of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and deal with this green menace. Thanks, and good luck!
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

Not all divine beings fight on the side of good. Some have chosen to attack the denizens of Maple World. Gather a group of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and teach those otherworldly bullies a lesson. Thanks, and good luck.
Gather a group of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and teach those otherworldly bullies a lesson. Thanks, and good luck.
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

It seems there are malevolent demons roaming about causing havoc. I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and dispatch those monsters. Thank you, and good luck.
I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and dispatch the demons wreaking havoc across Maple World. Thank you, and good luck.
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

Violent beasts have been rampaging about the land, attacking innocent people. I'd like you to put together a hunting party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and address the threat. Thanks, and good luck.
I'd like you to put together a hunting party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and dispatch the violent beasts plaguing the land. Thanks, and good luck.
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

The dead have risen to terrorize the people of this land. I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and return these monsters to the grave. Thanks, and good luck.

The dead have risen to terrorize the people of this land. I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and return these monsters to the grave. Thanks, and good luck.
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

There have been complaints about villainous fairfolk playing cruel and violent tricks on the people of this land. I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and teach those fairfolk a lesson. Thanks, and good luck.
I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and teach a lesson to the malicious fairfolk plaguing this land. Thanks, and good luck.
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

I don't know why, but there's been the number of people committing foul deeds as of late. I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and mete out justice to the humanoid evildoers at fault. Thanks, and good luck.
I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and mete out justice to the humanoid evildoers at who've been stirring up trouble. Thanks, and good luck.
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.
There are reports of evil spirits menacing the populace. I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and dispatch them. Thanks, and good luck.
I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and dispatch the menacing spirits haunting the land. Thanks, and good luck.
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Greetings, $MyPCName$! I'm sure you've heard there's been a lot of odd occurrences in Maple World lately. There's a lot of work that needs to be done, but we're extremely shorthanded. Do you think you and your guild might be able to help me out? I'd really appreciate it.

As you already know, $MyPCName$, powerful bosses often appear throughout the world and assault passersby. I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and do something about that. Thanks, and good luck.
I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and defeat some of the world bosses harassing travelers. Thanks, and good luck.
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.
Hello $MyPCName$! How's your guild? There's something I could use your help with. Actually, your whole guild for that matter. If you help me, I'll see that you are all rewarded.

An important task in maintaining the ecosystems of Maple World is checking the water quality of various bodies of water and, when necessary, adjusting their fish population. That's why I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and catch some freshwater fish. Easy, right? I'm counting on you!
All you have to do is put together a group of <font color="#ffd200">at least 3 guild members</font> and catch some freshwater fish. It'd be a great help. Thanks!
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.
Hello $MyPCName$! How's your guild? There's something I could use your help with. Actually, your whole guild for that matter. If you help me, I'll see that you are all rewarded.

An important task in maintaining the ecosystems of Maple World is checking the water quality of various bodies of water and, when necessary, adjusting their fish population. That's why I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and catch some saltwater fish. Easy, right? I'm counting on you!
All you have to do is put together a group of <font color="#ffd200">at least 3 guild members</font> and catch some saltwater fish from the sea. It'd be a great help. Thanks!
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.
Hello $MyPCName$! How's your guild? There's something I could use your help with. Actually, your whole guild for that matter. If you help me, I'll see that you are all rewarded.

An important task in maintaining the ecosystems of Maple World is checking the quality of various bodies of fluid and, when necessary, adjusting their fish population. That's why I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and go lava-fishing. Easy, right? I'm counting on you!
All you have to do is put together a group of <font color="#ffd200">at least 3 guild members</font> and catch some lava fish from a pool of unbelievably hot magma. It'd be a great help. Thanks!
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.
Hello $MyPCName$! How's your guild? There's something I could use your help with. Actually, your whole guild for that matter. If you help me, I'll see that you are all rewarded.

An important task in maintaining the ecosystems of Maple World is checking the quality of various bodies of water and, when necessary, adjusting their fish population. This includes the unique life that's developed in bodies of foulwater. That's why I'd like you to put together a party of <font color="#ffd200">3 or more guild members</font> and go foulwater-fishing. Easy, right? I'm counting on you!
All you have to do is put together a group of <font color="#ffd200">at least 3 guild members</font> and catch some foulwater fish from literal cesspool. It'd be a great help. Thanks!
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.
Hello $MyPCName$! How's your guild? There's something I could use your help with. Actually, your whole guild for that matter. If you help me, I'll see that you are all rewarded.

Maple World is a stressful place right now, and the people could use something nice to distract them. I'd like you to put together a performance troupe with <font color="#ffd200">at least 3 guild members</font> and play some music for the public, anywhere in the world.
I'd like you to put together a performance troupe with <font color="#ffd200">at least 3 guild members</font> and play some music for the public, anywhere in the world.
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting $MyPCName$. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.
Hello $MyPCName$! How's your guild? There's something I could use your help with. Actually, your whole guild for that matter. If you help me, I'll see that you are all rewarded.

Did you know there are golden treasure chests hidden throughout the world? The contents of such a chest must surely be of value to your guild. Why not put together a treasure-hunting party with <font color="#ffd200">at least 3 guild members</font> and try and find some of those chests?
Why not put together a treasure-hunting party with <font color="#ffd200">at least 3 guild members</font> and go hunting for the golden treasure chests hidden throughout the land?
Wow! You finished a lot quicker than I was expecting. Here, this is for helping out today. Thanks again! Stop by again tomorrow and I'll give you another assignment.

Did you know there are wooden treasure chests hidden throughout the world? The contents of such a chest must surely be of value to your guild. Why not put together a treasure-hunting party with <font color="#ffd200">at least 3 guild members</font> and try and find some of those chests?
